web_snippets: Dr. Jason Bloom is double board-certified in facial plastic & reconstructive surgery and otolaryngology - head & neck surgery.
... Dr. Jason Bloom is one of the top doctors in Pennsylvania. His philosophy is to provide each patient at Bloom Facial Plastics with a specialized treatment ...
Dr. Jason Bloom is deeply invested in the future of facial aesthetics, teaching around the world and leading clinical research with top aesthetics companies.
